title: One Piece 218-229 [720p Dual Audio][HWE]
description:
[HWE] began this One Piece project on May 31st, 2013, and we plan on bringing you One Piece in the following awesome format that very few other groups are doing:


720p / Dual Audio (English & Japanese) / English Subtitles


The episodes contain both the English dubbed audio and Japanese dubbed audio along with 2 subtitle tracks (1 for the English dub and 1 for the Japanese dub).  This process starts with episode 207, since it was the first episode of One Piece that was created in 16:9 HD format.  Here are some details about the encodes:

----------------------------------
Video: Japanese 1280x720 (720p) Uncut RAWs / x264 (CRF 19 or 20) / 23.976 FPS

Audio: English 5.1 AC3 (448 Kbps) from FUNi DVDs / Japanese 2.0 AAC (~188 Kbps)

Subtitles: Subs for English Audio / Subs for Japanese Audio (both from FUNi DVDs)
*These are soft subs in .ASS format, and are styled using the popular Impress BT font.  The font is attached to the .mkv files, so you don't need it installed on your machine.
----------------------------------

Right now FUNi DVDs have been released in English up to ep 275, so our plan is to get those done as soon as possible (although this will take some time).

Another set of FUNi DVDs, containing episodes 276-287, will be released on September 3rd, 2013.
